text: James Curtiss (April 7, 1803 - November 2, 1859) was an American politician who was the Mayor of Chicago two times. He ran for the Democrat. Curtiss was born on April 7, 1803 in Wethersfield, Connecticut. He was raised in both Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and in Chicago, Illinois. Curtiss died on November 2, 1859 in Joliet, Illinois from an illness, aged 53. ==References== ==Other websites== * First Inaugural Address * Second Inaugural Address Category:1803 births Category:1859 deaths Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Connecticut Category:Lawyers from Chicago
title: James Curtiss
